remarks: The domain and range of the function ` F ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Dec-2016.)
statement:
flift.1 $e |- F = ran ( x e. X |-> <. A , B >. ) $.
flift.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. X ) -> A e. R ) $.
flift.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. X ) -> B e. S ) $.
fliftf $p |- ( ph -> ( Fun F <-> F : ran ( x e. X |-> A ) --> S ) ) $.
$d R x $.
$d S x $.
$d X x $.
$d ph x $.
